name: RoomForThree
description:
WASD - Move

1234 - change player

go to the light... One must remain...

"4 sinners, have received a peculiar, yet fitting punishment. Each of them wake up in a maze. To know what it's like to betray one another, the escape is given, but only room for 3 of them. The one who doesn't make it, will remain in the maze for all eternity. During that time, he will know what it feels like to be ABANDONED."

2 of the songs are royalty free, from: 

https://www.fesliyanstudios.comroyalty-free-musicdownloads-csuspenseful-music25
